{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-685 |revision=A1 |upc=790069321900 |asin=B002COJEOU |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-NS01 |availability=now |fcc_date=01/23/2009 |fcc_id=RRK-WMPND02A1 |ic_id=4833A-WMPND02A1 |type=wireless router, NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel (EIAJ-02) |pwr_barrel_outer=4.0 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.7 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Cortina Systems |cpu1_model=ELCS3516C |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL256P11TFI01 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU121622DTP-D43 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0, SATA, |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J3 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (19200 8N1) |wi1_module=Alpha Networks WMP-N08 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2880F |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2850L |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL (internal) |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366SR |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Touch Input PSOC;Cypress;CY8C214;;1;,,, TFT LCD Single Chip Driver;ILI Technology;ILI9322;;1;,,, 30V, 12A N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4408;;1;,,, 30V, 12A P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4407;;1;,,, 2A Termination Regulator;Analog Integrations Corporation;AIC1383A;;1;,,, Low Voltage 16-Bit Transparent Latch;Fairchild;74LCX16373;;1;,,, 3A, 23V, 385KHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1423DN;;1;,,, 8A, 16V, 600KHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MPGC01;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1; |flags=LCD Display, touchpad, fan, |stock_boot=Redboot;Storlink SL351x Boot Loader;v1.0.9; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.15; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=dlink |default_ssid_regex=^dlink$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin |oui=00:26:5A |oui_eth=00:26:5A }} {{TagLine|Xtreme N Storage Router}} :[https://legacy.us.dlink.com/pages/product.aspx?id=49898d723089475fa8d6af4f8b99b6ab Support page]
"8WRGNS01.4A1G" and "1012" is silkscreened on the [https://dflund.se/~triad/krad/dlink-dir-685/dir-685-pcb-back-large.jpg board]. :OEM: [[Alpha Networks]] (WRG-NS01)
This device has a fan. The RT2880 module is soldered in. :The CPU used is the [[Storlink]] SL3516 / [[Cortina]] CS3516.
The default SSID is presumed to be '''dlink'''.
{{WiFiCert|WFA7009|02/20/2009}}
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/30864-smashed-mash-up-d-link-dir-685-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.ohgizmo.com/2009/06/30/ohgizmo-review-d-link-dir-685-xtreme-n-storage-router/ Reviewed on '''OhGizmo''']
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=634986 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (links to pictures) *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r22607966-DLinks-new-DIR685-is-speed-daemon Post on '''DSLReports''' with specs] :(once housed some assumedly useful pictures now gone) *[https://dflund.se/~triad/krad/dlink-dir-685/ Booting mainline Linux on this router]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cortina]]'' ELCS3516C ARM9 (@300MHz) *Memory: 128 (SDRAM) DDR *Storage: 32MB Flash, 1x SATA Port *WiFi: [[Ralink]] RT2880F (802.11bgn) *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:D-Link DIR-685 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:D-Link DIR-685 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:D-Link DIR-685 Video & Touch.jpeg|Touch & Video </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
